communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Body-Worn Footage Request (06/28/2025 Arrest – MCSO)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern,

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act (Texas Government Code, Chapter 552), I respectfully request access to any body-worn camera footage related to the arrest of:

- Full Name: Samantha Trevino  
- Date of Birth: April 26, 1990  
- Arrest Date & Time: June 28, 2025 at approximately 2:14 AM  
- Arresting Agency: Montgomery County Sheriff’s Office (MCSO)  
- Arrest Location: Eastex Freeway & Northpark, Montgomery County, TX  
- Charges:  
  • Assault on a Public Servant / Police Officer  
  • Abandoning or Endangering a Child – Criminal Negligence  
  • Other charges listed but not accepted: Reckless Driving; Possession of Marijuana < 2oz

If any responsive footage exists, I respectfully request that the video files be delivered electronically via email or a secure downloadable link. I do not wish to receive physical media such as CDs or USBs.

Please provide a cost estimate for any labor or redaction fees associated with the video footage only. I would like to be notified of any charges before processing begins.

This request is made for non-commercial and informational purposes only, and is not intended for resale or direct profit.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Sincerely,  
Umut Ozkan
